segments.text: Can I also take the MET to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah sure , it's much quicker . Do you know how ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , can I trouble you to lend me a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , not a problem . Let's go to the station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to buy a ticket first . You want to go to Shi Da , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , then you need to go to Tai Power Building Station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at the map to see where you are . Then look at where you want to go . The number is how much money you have to pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , when you have your ticket , you go wait on the platform .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just remember to hold on to your ticket . You need it to get out of the station when you get there .
segments.speaker: S1
